quest.name: What We Do for Family
journal:
 Quest Sync
Varthon is in a hurry, but not in such a hurry that he would deny a helping hand.
objectives: With the chat mode in Say, enter “tuktu” to assure Karnes you are not an enemy.
Search the designated location for Slitherbough serum.
Deliver the Slitherbough serum to Karnes.

dialogue.name: VARTHON
dialogue.text: You! You're that guest Master Matoya was telling us about. Please, you have to help me!

dialogue.name: VARTHON
dialogue.text: I've searched high and low, but I can't find my friend Karnes anywhere. I fear he's run off to Fort Gohn again.

dialogue.name: VARTHON
dialogue.text: It's where we grew up, but it was abandoned years ago after the sin eaters attacked.

dialogue.name: VARTHON
dialogue.text: The place is teeming with all manner of beasts now, and Master Matoya has expressly forbidden anyone from setting foot there.

dialogue.name: VARTHON
dialogue.text: I don't know what's gotten into him lately, but we have to find him, before he gets hurt. If you should find him first, you'll want to tell him our password─tuktu. He's the skittish sort, so don't delay in telling him so he'll know you mean no harm.

dialogue.name: KARNES
dialogue.text: S-Stay away! I beg of you!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: With the chat mode in Say, use your keyboard or the software keyboard to enter “tuktu” and allay Karnes's fears.

dialogue.name: KARNES
dialogue.text: You... You're from Slitherbough? Varthon must have sent you, then.

dialogue.name: KARNES
dialogue.text: I was fine until that damned beetle. It's only a scratch, but I'm starting to feel numb, and my vision's grown clouded.

dialogue.name: KARNES
dialogue.text: Worst of all, I dropped my only vial of serum somewhere in these damned woods. Could you find it for me?

dialogue.name: KARNES
dialogue.text: The vial should be somewhere close by.

dialogue.name: VARTHON
dialogue.text: So you came back after all.

dialogue.name: KARNES
dialogue.text: There you are. Did you find it?

dialogue.name: KARNES
dialogue.text: Thank you. I should be fine now after a bit of rest.

dialogue.name: VARTHON
dialogue.text: What were you thinking coming back here? You could've been killed!

dialogue.name: KARNES
dialogue.text: I had to, Varthon. For my father...
